Bookshelf(ActionValidator) Class Reference

#import <Bookshelf+ActionValidator.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(BOOL) - visitMenuItemParametersForUrlTemporality:target_p:action_p:title_p:
 Calculates current parameters (enabled, target, action, title) for a menu item which could visit the receiver's currently-selected starks with a given url temporality.

Detailed Description

  • Application Main Menu: Will invoke the -validateMenuItem for the current document because of the document window in the responder chain
  • Inspector Gear Button menu: Will not invoke the -validateMenuItem for the current document because it is a contextual menu, and the responder chain for contextual menus does not inlude any other windows.
  • Main Window Contextual Menus (ContentOutlineView and DupesOutlineView): Will invoke the -validateMenuItem for the current document because the responder chain for contextual menus does inlude the current window.

Member Function Documentation

- (BOOL) visitMenuItemParametersForUrlTemporality: (BkmxUrlTemporality)  urlTemporality
target_p: (id *)  target_p
action_p: (SEL *)  action_p
title_p: (NSString **)  title_p 

Calculates current parameters (enabled, target, action, title) for a menu item which could visit the receiver's currently-selected starks with a given url temporality.

Parameters:
urlTemporality The temporality (prior URL, current URL, or suggested URL) of the url to be used in the hypothetical visit.
target_p On return, if non-NULL, points to the target of the menu item.
action_p On return, if non-NULL, points to the action of the menu item.  This will be NULL if the menu item should not be enabled.
title_p On return, if non-NULL, points to the title of the menu item.
Returns:
YES if the menu item should be enabled, NO otherwise.
